welcome_description: Use DataRobot's intuitive chat-based analyst to ask questions about your data.
welcome_get_started: Get started by selecting the datasets you want to work with.
processing_dataset: Processing the dataset may take a few minutes...
no_data_available: No data available for this dataset.
check_connection: Check your DataRobot connection and try again
use_refresh_button: Use the Refresh button to connect if DataRobot is available
manual_api_token: Manually enter your DataRobot API token to authenticate with the service.
sidebar_description: Add the data you want to analyze, then ask DataRobot questions to generate insights.
prompt_title: Type a question about your dataset
prompt_description: Ask specific questions about your datasets to get insights, generate visualizations, and discover patterns. Include column names and the kind of analysis you're looking for to get more accurate results.
prompt_placeholder_disabled: Please upload and process data using the sidebar before starting the chat
prompt_placeholder_enabled: Ask another question about your datasets.
create_chat_description: Creating a new chat does not affect any of your existing questions.
enter_chat_name: Enter a name for your chat
upload_network_error: Upload failed due to network error, please try upload again
upload_file_error:
The dataset(s) is not supported by the system. The following types of datasets may cause errors:
- File size exceeds 200MB
- CSV data is not encoded in UTF-8
